title: My Goal :D compelte
body:
I know it might not be a high goal BUT last season i started at bronze 2 i hated myself i just can't believe i was in there so i didn't play ranks for like ever until just about September i started finding out what you get from ranks and thought to myself I've had this much time I've gotten better and maybe i can strive for a goal and my goal was to get to gold i tried my hardest until the rank season ended and finished up Silver 2 which i was happy i got to and i only started playing league that year so I've gotten better over time. :)

The next Season, I had a nice start to the rank season going 8/2 in my games and getting to start off at Silver 2. I do have to say the amount of trolls, feeders, people that don't know how to team fight was just too high to explain i went from Silver 3 to Silver 1 like 4 times But i got into my promos for Gold at least 4 times as well which was painful to play i go 2/2 in everyone then the last one theres just this one person thats like oh he's on his promo lets feed/ troll.  like a jayce top and i was jungle he fed 4 early kills to a riven and NO way am i going to gank that lane and give riven a free double so he decided to sell all his items and just stack tears -.-. But after all that did my promos last night and just playing ap shaco. Im currently on a 6 win streak in ranks playing ap shaco top its just so fun and it got me to my GOAL GOLD I'm so ****ing happy but a pain to try and stay in.

( Saying this i know trolls, feeders, people that get mad are in every rank so i don't expect it to stop all of a sudden) SO if you're new make a goal try and strive the best you can i know i did and I've got my goal finally if i can so can you. :) {{champion:35}} {{item:3285}}
PS i know i spelt the title wrong :,(

replies.body: Wow nice made to gold from bronze could you tell me the about of time it took for you to reach gold? Because this season for my placement I got 7/3 and ended up in b5 but since then I climbed to b3 and trying to make my way to silver. TELL ME WHAT YOU DID YOU REACH SILVER!

>
> Wow nice made to gold from bronze could you tell me the about of time it took for you to reach gold? Because this season for my placement I got 7/3 and ended up in b5 but since then I climbed to b3 and trying to make my way to silver. TELL ME WHAT YOU DID YOU REACH SILVER!

well Last season around july i started doing ranks around the time i hit level 30 and placed in b2 which then i didn't play until around september where i wanted to get higher and focused which i was just climbing the ranks in about a week or 2 i reached s3 then got a little hard for me but i made to s2 by the end ( I played a lot of Darius, Vi, Sion, Yasuo in bronze btw). 

Then this season went 8/2  placed in Silver 2 been going though getting demoted along the way but reached Gold last night with a 6 win streak of AP Shaco top. 

I would say like other Youtubers, popular steamers say MAIN champions its the best way to climb ranks is to main a few get to know the match ups and how to beat them so you can climb with the champion. Like when the new sion came out i mained him and ended up going 18-6 by the end of Season 4 knowing what match ups i can beat and how if i got countered.

Edit: The most important rule for me when i want to climb is to respect each other play as a team and not get angry if you don't get the role you want I'm currently like 22 games with thresh and 18 games with sona at Support but i main jungle, Top but i was nice and let others that say they can't support let them have their roles. Even when i was first pick i would go support

Don't worry I rarely rage at my team I am usually am supportive but I what I wanted to know how long it took you thats all. It took me like 2 weeks just to climb two leagues but only played ranked once every couple of days like maybe one per day but took breaks though thats why it took me long.
